edu.sjsu.yazdankhah.crypto.util.ciphersysdatatypes

Class SimpleSubKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.yazdankhah.crypto.util.ciphersysdatatypes.SimpleSubKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Const

    public class SimpleSubKey
extends java.lang.Object
implements Const
    Simulates an immutable simple substitution key data structure used in classic cipher system called Simple Substitution.
    Author:
    ahmad

      • constructEncryptionMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Character> constructEncryptionMap()
        Constructs an encryption hash map for the generalized simple substitution cipher system.
        Returns:
        an hash map containing English alphabet (lowercase) as the keys and the contents of this object characters (uppercase) as values.

      • constructDecryptionMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Character> constructDecryptionMap()
        Constructs an decryption hash map for the generalized simple substitution cipher system.
        Returns:
        an hash map containing the contents of this object characters (uppercase) as the keys and English alphabet (lowercase) as the values.
